meanings.definition: In a manner that is excessively serious or solemn.
meanings.sent1: She spoke overseriously about the weather, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: He always talks overseriously during important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The clown overseriously juggled rubber chickens, causing giggles from the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her overseriously stern expression softened when she saw the puppy.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's overseriously strict rules made the students nervous.

meanings.definition: To take something too seriously or to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: Don't overseriously stress about the test; just do your best.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overseriously analyze every little detail.
meanings.sent3: He overseriously thought his cat was plotting against him.
meanings.sent4: The team overseriously tackled the project, finishing it ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent5: The child overseriously believed that eating crusts would make their hair curly.
